title: Secondary Entrypoint Schema
description: Creates a secondary entrypoint in a library project in the current workspace.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the seoncdary library?

path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

entryFile.description: The path at which to create the library's secondary public API file, relative to the workspace root.
